bika_create_record.description: Creates a new record in database.

bika_delete_record.description: Deletes a record in database by ID.

props.name: recordId
props.description: The ID of the record to delete.

bika_find_record.description: Retrieves a record in database by ID.

props.name: maxRecords
props.description: How many records are returned in total.

props.name: pageSize
props.description: How many records are returned per page (max 1000).

props.name: filter
props.description: The filter to apply to the records (see https://bika.ai/help/guide/developer/filter-query-language).

bika_update_record.description: Updates an existing record in database.

props.name: recordId
props.description: The ID of the record to update.
